title: Dark Demon Knights
description: Survival. It shouldn't be this hard. After blowing up an international treasure and ousting a traitor, Aurora is back to normal life. She just forgot that her "normal" is assassins, demons, and death. Strangers shrouded in cloaks slither into Gossamer Falls in search of a dark, ancient power. And they're ready to kill anyone sho gets in their way. Especially the Hex Boys. These vicious visitors have a fate worse than death planned for Aurora, which means...Homework will have to wait.
author: A.  Kirk
